keys_c_v_b_n_key2:
In this part of the Bottom Rows tutorial, we'll learn the use of `keys` `c` , `v` , `b` and `n`.
Position your left middle finger and left index finger on the left groove on the `key`board, and your right index finger on the right groove of the `key`board. The bottom row `keys` will be on level below the home row `keys`. With each of your middle and index fingers from both hands, try to reach the `keys` `c`, `v`, `b` and `n`, and try to remember the movement. Look away from the `key`board and feel the grooves with your fingers and try to find them by moving your fingers away.
